Speaker: Kitty
Text: Do you have any idea what you’ve done?!

Speaker: Milo
Text: Yes, it is me, Milo!  Saviour of Monsters!

Speaker: Kitty
Text: Do you have any idea how many people you hurt?!

Speaker: Milo
Text: What did those monsters do to you?!  Well, you’re not getting the Doctor, not now!

Speaker: Ryker
Text: Yeah, slow down a little.  It’s all over now.

Speaker: Milo
Text: No, I won’t! You killed them!

Speaker: Dr. G
Text: Come on Milo, you’re better than this!
